template.name: rb-descendants
template.value: class Class def descendants ObjectSpace.each_object(::Class).select { |klass| klass < self } end end

template.name: rb-blankslate
template.value: class $var0$ instance_methods.each { |meth| undef_method(meth) unless meth =~ /\A__/ } end $END$

template.name: rb-optp
rb-tc
template.value:
require 'test/unit'
require '$var1$'
class Test$var2$ < Test::Unit::TestCase def test_$var3$ $END$ end end

template.name: rb-begin
template.value: begin fail 'A test exception.' rescue Exception => e puts e.message puts e.backtrace.inspect else # other exception ensure # always executed end
